comments.raw_text:
center is not a valid align attribute for iframes. If you want it centered,
stick it in a centered block element. iframes are inline, and will be centered
by centering its parent block element (you probably could use CSS and set the
display to block on the iframe and center it with auto margins as well).
comments.creator: tonglebeak@gmail.com
